attributes.action: Please label all food products clearly when they contain alcohol.
attributes.additional_details: It is in many foods you would not expect, even beverages that look alcohol free. This can make recovery so much more difficult for an addict. As with known allergies, such as nuts, please make it clearer for people to make an easy and informed choice on all food and drink products.
attributes.background: With lots of allergies listed on food packaging why not alcohol? Many people with alcoholism do not want the taste or substance in their food , especially when in recovery. This can make our lives very difficult as we have to check every single ingredient before we can buy a product.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for this to be made a legal requirement.
